__e: Bob warned me you can be a pain in the ass.
Marty said you were cute, but he didn't tell me you were drop dead gorge!
Your friend warned him that he'd given you his number.
Why did no one tell me being the mayor involved work?
Well, why couldn't he have warned us he was trying...?
She just texted me that she was car-jacked, but she's still going to try to make it!
Why didn't you inform me that his mother was here.
Why didn't you warn me your mother was doing this?
Why didn't you warn me you were coming over?
But, look, they know That it was me that tipped off the cops,
I want you to know that I'm the one who tipped off the police, in case you were wondering.
If he's alerted the cops, that's it then, we're out of here.
Maybe he better first tell us why he didn't warn our folks.
Actually, he did let me know, in his own way. And, already an adult, I didn't figure it out for myself.
Was anybody on patrol here last night?
Kevin said someone tipped off his dad, was it you?
Why didn't you tell me what he was saying before?
But she'd also advise me not to talk about my dead wife on a date with a beautiful woman.
Even though everyone I know warned me not to hang around with you.
She told me he warned her about giving us points of her take.
Now I know why you warned me against my brother.
Your father, he warned me about my life with you.
He warned me about this, he was right about you, he was right about all of you.
When Jake finished his story, Dad told the most powerful man in town... that he was sure he was somehow involved in his own daughter's death.
Why you didn't tell Old Nick it was my birthday?
But you didn't warn Mark. The brother you forgot you had.
